baseRule.text: 「若比丘尼，無病，二人共床臥，波逸提。
baseRule.label: Classical Chinese Dharmaguptaka Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 90

partialParallels.text: 若比丘尼與白衣及外道婦女更相覆眠。波逸提。
partialParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahīśāsaka Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 151

partialParallels.text: Yā pana bhikkhuniyo dve ekamañce tuvaṭṭeyyuṁ, pācittiyaṁ.
partialParallels.label: Paḷī Theravāda Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 31

translations.text: Welche Nonnen sich aber zu zweit ein Bett teilen, müssen dafür sühnen.
Should two bhikkhunis share a single bed, it is to be confessed.
Jika dua orang Bhikkhuni berbagi sebuah tempat tidur, itu harus di akui.

partialParallels.text: 若二比丘尼共一床臥。波夜提。
partialParallels.label: Classical Chinese Sarvāstivāda Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 87

partialParallels.text: 若復苾芻尼二尼同一床臥者。波逸底迦。
partialParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mūlasarvāstivāda Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 100

partialParallels.text: 若比丘尼。與比丘尼式叉摩那沙彌尼。更相覆眠。波逸提。
partialParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahīśāsaka Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 152
